Text: Delete this now please!! People could buy their books themselves.. This is a waste too, if you're gonna put out a torrent with the 39 clues, you could as well put out all your card-codes and book 9, 10 and "the black book of buried secrets" too, if you know what they are..
What a strange way to request books...
My daughter just read the first book - and forgot the 2nd one at school... she's very happy that we can download it and read it now. Thanks
